Legacy Document

Important: The information in this document is obsolete and should not be used for new development.

Inside Macintosh: Mac OS Runtime Architectures /

This Apple manual was written, edited, and composed on a desktop publishing system using Apple Macintosh computers and FrameMaker software. Line art was created using Adobe Illustrator\x89 and Adobe Photoshop\x89.

Text type is Palatino\x90 and display type is Helvetica\x90. Bullets are ITC Zapf Dingbats®. Some elements, such as program listings, are set in Adobe Letter Gothic.
